EEG Plot¶

Orange widget that plots epochs from an eeg data file.

Inputs

  • Raw

  • Epochs

  • Evoked

  • BrainVision

Use

Press the Show plot button to display the graph.

Example¶

More information about plot Raw here. More information about plot Evoked here. More information about plot Epochs here.
